entities.name: dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is a symbol of the wizarding world's allegiance to Voldemort. It is mentioned as something that still unites them under his rule.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main character and leader of the group. He is described as having a 'terrible face' and is able to sense guilt in others.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is a member of the group who is sobbing over his bleeding arm.

relationships.description: The Dark Mark symbolizes Voldemort's rule and allegiance.
Voldemort senses Wormtail's guilt and has sympathy for him.
